thread.section_title: Sportsmemorabilia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sportsmemorabilia | www.sportsmemorabilia.com | 3 of 46
thread.title: Joshua Hughes

author: Joshua Hughes
title: Joshua Hughes
text:
Melissa Ospina helped me with an issue I was having regarding a returned product/ account credit. She did an outstanding job being sensitive to the issue I was having and was very timely and professional taking care of this issue for me. As with any business I associate with, repeat business is dictated not by a problem free service, but the follow up and professional help with issues that arise, as they do with every business.
Again, Melissa's help today should be the standard of SportsMemorabilia.com and will doubt ensure the repeat business that every company hopes for in the future.
THANK YOU MELISSA!!!! And your employer/ management team should thank you as well for representing them in such a high quality fashion.
